title: An integrated artificial intelligence framework for public management
research_description: This paper proposes an integrated AI framework for public management, addressing its potential, risks, and implementation. The authors discuss how AI can enhance public management and propose guidelines for responsible use.
research_results: The study concludes that AI frameworks for public administration can improve efficiency and decision-making but also introduce risks such as loss of control and ethical concerns.
future_research: Future research could explore empirical applications of the proposed AI framework in various public sector contexts.
